alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, northwestern Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Steinhatchee, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salem, Tennille, Carbur and Clara. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
